r.s: An extension to track progress of a file upload.
r.d: See http://cvs.php.net/viewvc.cgi/pecl/uploadprogress/examples/ for a little example. It is only known to work on Apache with mod_php, other SAPI implementations unfortunately still have issues. At least PHP 5.2 is needed.
r.n: - Fixed an issue with filenames containing spaces, see http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=14525 for details (by franck). - Extended the example to check for too large files.
